# RelevantContext.SleepCondition

**Structure**

Values that represent a person’s typical bedtime or wakeup time.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SleepCondition
```

## Conditions

- **bedtime**: A timespan close to when a person typically goes to bed.
- **wakeup**: A timespan close to when a person typically wakes up.

## Sleep clues

- **sleep(_:)**: Tells the system a widget is relevant because of a person’s sleep schedule.

items.description: A timespan close to when a person typically goes to bed.
items.name: bedtime

items.description: A timespan close to when a person typically wakes up.
items.name: wakeup

items.description: Tells the system a widget is relevant because of a person’s sleep schedule.
